body: This flask of caustic liquid reacts with an ooze's natural acids. You can throw an alkali flask as a splash weapon with a range increment of 10 feet. Against non-ooze creatures, an alkali flask functions as a normal flask of acid. Against oozes and other acid-based creatures, the alkali flask inflicts double damage.
name: Alkali Flask
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Special Substances and Items/Alkali Flask
